data.title: Seroprevalence of COVID-19 virus infection in Guilan province, Iran

Competing Interest Statement

Funding Statement

This research has been sponsored by Iranâ€™s Ministry of health and performed under a research grant from deputy of research at Guilan University of medical sciences. The authors are grateful to all health centers' employees and personnel for cooperating and conducting the survey as well as participants that took part in this research.

All relevant ethical guidelines have been followed; any necessary IRB and/or ethics committee approvals have been obtained and details of the IRB/oversight body are included in the manuscript.
